PRIVACY_FOLLOWERS: Only your followers can see it
LOGIN_PROBLEMS: Do you have problems to Logging In?
TRAVEL_JOURNAL_DESCRIPTION: Customize by country passport, personal interests and activites you enjoy.
WELCOME_OFFLINE_DESCRIPTION: Offline! Online! We got your back with ALL important information, we know travelers need, such as: currency exchange, visa info, weather, air pollution, map in every city in the world.
WELCOME_EVENTS_DESCRIPTION: Quickly and conveniently find events nearby or plan ahead. Join the world by meeting with locals and other travelers at social events or activites.
WELCOME_CONNECT_WORLD_DESCRIPTION: See a place you want to go, save it, create a future trip easily. Plan last minute explorations. Reminicse on past trips through pictures, videos and the route displayed on your Map. Share with friends.
WELCOME_LINK_DESCRIPTION: Mapdonut helps you connect, share, explore and link-up with users, travelers and locals, in the palm of your hand.
WELCOME_READY_TO_TRAVEL_DESCRIPTION: Discover all original pictures and places our users have collected first hand. Find locations easily that guide you directly to the most beautiful places in the world.
FIREBASE_ERROR_auth/invalid-email: The email address is badly formatted
FIREBASE_ERROR_auth/invalid-phone-number: The phone number must be a non-empty
NAME: Name
MAX_PICS_TRIP: The limit is ${limit} photos or videos
MAX_PASSPORTS: You can Save at max 4 passport
MAX_CURRENCIES: You can save at max 10 currencies
SMS_WRONG: The SMS verification code is wrong.
SMS_INSTRUCTIONS: We sent you a SMS with a code to confirm your sign-in/sign-up
BLOCK_DEVICE_MULTIPLTE_REQUESTS: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.
CHOOSE_THEME_LOGIN: Do you prefer Light or Dark Theme?
CHOOSE_THEME_LOGIN_DESCRIPTION: We want to customize Mapdonut for everyone!
